headline.main: NET IS CLOSING AROUND THE BALKANS; Nazis in Danger From Italian Mainland and Greek Islands

lead_paragraph: CAIRO, Oct. 2 -- The Allied advance in Italy now threatens to outflank from the west Hitler's first line of Balkan defenses while the Aegean island operations which have been going on are threatening gradually to crack the eastern outposts of the vaunted "iron ring" line of positions.
